title: The Temptation of Kimono
overview: Mikage will get married to Youiti next year, she agrees to live with Youiti's parents. One day, Youiti's father disrobed Mikage's Kimono and raped her. To her astonishment, her fianc√© Youiti whom Mikage considers true love has an affair with his young stepmother. Shocked and devastated, what will Mikage do?
